comment.author: 57140310@N04
comment._content:
Friends,
From the now inactive 82ndfightergroup.com this hanger is at Mines Field, Inglewood CA (now LAX) and was the operations building and hanger for the 95th FS/82nd FG the “Flying Sergeants” when it was station there for the air defense of L.A. from May to September 1942. In general it looks to me if there are P-38s, barrage balloons and this hanger in the picture it is at Mines Field. Why they are labeled at Hammer Field, Fresno, CA I don’t know.
Best regards,
Tom
